1.0.name: wordpress/equity-disclosure
1.0.description: Administrator of the Blog enters in information regarding the companies they, and all their blog writers have any interest, such as being a director or officer of the firm, holding 10 percent or more equity, or owning public stock. This is performed through the Administrator Dashboard, Equity Disclosure menu. The companies may be added and deleted at will, and are stored locally in the WordPress database, custom table disclosures. Then the administrator must place this widget in the sidebar. The blog writers' equity information will appear on the widget placement.
